name: pubmedsearch
description: This uses PubMed's search API to research the topic, and should be used for biomedical and life science adjacent requests.

params.keywords: A comma separated list of short, simple keywords to query the PubMed database (i.e. 'gi bleeding, proton pump inhibitor', 'colon cancer, screening, tumor markers', or 'hyperlipidemia, statins, PCSK9 inhibitors').
